CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Interestingly , the trend observed in the PCE values differed from that of optical behavior of the PBDTT-DPP-TPD in terms of the DPP to TPD ratio , showing nonlinear compositional dependence from 2 to 6% .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| PBDTT-DPP-TPD |
| DPP |
| TPD |

In the given paragraph, the following are the material names:

1. PCE (Polymer-based electron donor material in organic photovoltaics)
2. PBDTT-DPP-TPD (Polymer blend used in organic photovoltaics)
3. DPP (Organic semiconductor material)
4. TPD (Organic semiconductor material)

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDTT-DPP-TPD |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, the only clear material name is:

1. PBDTT-DPP-TPD (Polymer blend used in organic photovoltaics)

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Interestingly , the trend observed in the PCE values differed from that of optical behavior of the PBDTT-DPP-TPD in terms of the DPP to TPD ratio , showing nonlinear compositional dependence from 2 to 6% .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE values |
| DPP to TPD ratio |
| compositional dependence |

The three property names identified in the paragraph are "PCE values", "DPP to TPD ratio", and "compositional dependence". These entities are mentioned as they are observed or exhibited by the "optical behavior of the PBDTT-DPP-TPD".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE values |
| DPP to TPD ratio |

After reviewing the paragraph, I have removed "compositional dependence" as it is not a material property, but rather a relationship between material properties. The two remaining entities, "PCE values" and "DPP to TPD ratio", are material properties that are being observed or exhibited by the "optical behavior of the PBDTT-DPP-TPD".
